content:
Stay with us through March 2020 and save. Book your getaway to our trendy NoMad neighborhood for 40% less only when you use this exclusive offer. In addition to our prime location, polished rooms, and posh style, enjoy our host of amenities included in your stay:

*Wi-Fi
*Local calls
*Coffee and tea at the front desk between 6-7 am
*Newspapers
*2 bottles of water
*Access to fitness center and business center 
*Heated year-round rooftop pool and sundeck access
*Discounts for Flywheel Sports Cutler Salon and Exhale Spa
